Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employers from inquiring about or relying on a prospective employee’s salary history
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting employers from inquiring about a prospective employee’s salary history.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employers from inquiring about or relying on a prospective employee’s salary history
